RBA Skincare Luminous Cleanse

Brand: RBA Skincare

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Vera, Prickly Pear, Coconut Oil, Organic Sunflower, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil, Castor Seed Oil, Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, Guar Gum, Citric Acid, Rosemary Seed Extract, Vegetable Glycerin, Orange) Flower, Lavandin, Radish Root Ferment

Directions:

Ferment

Directions: Massage a dime size drop onto damp skin. Rinse with warm water. Use daily.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
